settings.title: Seattle Jewelry Repair
settings.description: Jewelry that's just sitting in your jewelry box does you no good!

settings.title: Bring in your jewelry that is broken or doesn't fit
settings.text:
Revitalize your treasured jewelry with expert care in Seattle. Our master goldsmiths specialize in restoring and repairing everything from heirlooms and antique pieces to your everyday favorites.

Our skilled staff have 15+ years of experience and a trained eye for detail to help you identify the best way to repair your jewelry. Whether you need a ring resized or a missing gemstone replaced, we treat each piece with precision and dedication. Your beloved jewelry will be restored to its original splendor, ready to be passed down through generations.

Trust us for professional Seattle jewelry repair that brings your precious items back to life.

"As far back as I can remember, I've always enjoyed being with nature. So much so that I received my degree in Environmental Science & Resource Management from the University of Washington so that I dedicate my life to saving wildlife. Obviously, life can change but what you have in your heart does not and I will always stand up for wildlife. Growing up here in Seattle, I am blessed to call the PNW home and if you're from here or have visited, you understand just how precious our surroundings are.

I firmly believe that we all share the responsibility to contribute to the protection of our environment for the well-being of future generations. Here at my company, we are committed to being conscientious stewards of the planet, ensuring that every decision we make considers its environmental impact. Together, we can collaborate to diminish our environmental footprint and pave the way for a more sustainable future."

-Valerie

settings.title: What types of jewelry repair can I bring in?
settings.content:
We can help with:

  • Ring resizing (up or down)
  • Prong repair or retipping (to secure loose stones)
  • Bezel tightening (to secure loose stones)
  • Re-shanking (repair or replace the band of a ring)
  • Missing stones (replacement for diamonds or gemstones)
  • Chain repair or replacement
  • Clasp repair or replacement
  • Earring back replacement (lost or damaged backs)
  • Converting single diamond earrings into pendants
  • Pearl restringing (prevent worn or loose strands)
  • Soldering (repairing breaks in metal)
  • Polishing and refinishing (restoring shine and removing scratches)
  • Rhodium plating (for white gold restoration)
  • Jewelry cleaning (deep cleaning for dull or dirty jewelry)
  • Engraving repair (restore worn or faded engravings)

settings.title: What types of jewelry do you NOT work with?
settings.content:
We don't work with or repair:

  • Costume jewelry
  • Sterling silver
  • Gold purity less than 14K
  • Watches or watch battery replacements

settings.title: What is the cost?
settings.content: Every jewelry piece is unique. Estimates can be provided if you call us with a description of your repair needs but bring your piece by our shop for a more official quote.

settings.title: What is the turnaround time?
settings.content: Expect to leave your piece with us from 2-4 weeks depending on the complexity.
We're in the Seattle neighborhood of Madrona.
